Documentation
Table of Contents

Codeunit "ESCA Message"

ID 71177004

Properties

Name Value
Access Public

Methods

Clear

Clears all the global variables

procedure Clear()

SetSource

Sets the source / record(s) triggering the sending of the message. These sources will be used to build the message content.

procedure SetSource(NewSource: Variant)

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewSource Variant

The source / record(s) used to send a message

SetPartnerCode

Sets the code of the partner to whom to send the message. This will be used to filter the message types to send.

procedure SetPartnerCode(NewPartnerCode: Code[30])

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewPartnerCode Code[30]

The code of the partner to whom to send the message

SetMessageTypeCode

Sets the message type code of the message to send. This will be used to filter the message types to send.

procedure SetMessageTypeCode(NewMessageTypeCode: Code[30])

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewMessageTypeCode Code[30]

The code of the message type to send

SetMessageType

Sets the message type of the message to send. This will be used to filter the message types to send.

procedure SetMessageType(NewMessageType: Enum "ESCA Message Type")

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewMessageType "ESCA Message Type"

The message type of the message to send

SetCommunicationMethod

Sets the communication method of the message to send.

procedure SetCommunicationMethod(NewCommunicationMethod: Enum "ESCA Communication Method")

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewCommunicationMethod "ESCA Communication Method"

The communication method of the message to send

SetOperation

Sets the operation performed on the source (record). This is logged in the message link record and can be included in the message contents.

procedure SetOperation(NewOperation: Enum "ESCA Operation")

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewOperation "ESCA Operation"

The operation performed on the source (record)

SetTempBlob

Sets the message content of the message to send.

procedure SetTempBlob(NewTempBlob: Codeunit "Temp Blob")

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewTempBlob "Temp Blob"

A temp blob containing the message content as blob

SetAutoSend

Sets whether sending messages is triggered via an automatic process or not (manual) If NewAutoSend is set, only message types with the 'Auto Send' setting will be considered

procedure SetAutoSend(NewAutoSend: Boolean)

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewAutoSend Boolean

True if sending messages is triggered via an automatic process

SetTestMessage

Sets whether the message is a test message If NewTestMessage is set, the message is not processed on the receiving end

procedure SetTestMessage(NewTestMessage: Boolean)

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewTestMessage Boolean

True if the message is a test message

Send

Sends the message

procedure Send(NewSource: Variant, NewMessageType: Enum "ESCA Message Type"): Integer

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewSource Variant

The source / record(s) used to send a message
NewMessageType "ESCA Message Type"

The message type of the message to send

Returns

Type Description
Integer

The entry number of the created message record.

SendAutomatically

Sends the message triggered by an automatic process (Release, post, ...)

procedure SendAutomatically(NewSource: Variant, NewMessageType: Enum "ESCA Message Type"): Integer

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewSource Variant

The source / record(s) used to send a message
NewMessageType "ESCA Message Type"

The message type of the message to send

Returns

Type Description
Integer

The entry number of the created message record.

SendAutomatically

Sends the message triggered by an automatic process (Release, post, ...)

procedure SendAutomatically(NewSource: Variant, NewMessageType: Enum "ESCA Message Type", NewOperation: Enum "ESCA Operation"): Integer

Parameters

Name Type Description
NewSource Variant

The source / record(s) used to send a message
NewMessageType "ESCA Message Type"

The message type of the message to send
NewOperation "ESCA Operation"

The operation performed on the source (record)

Returns

Type Description
Integer

The entry number of the created message record.

Send

Sends the message (using the pre-defined global variables)

procedure Send(): Integer

Returns

Type Description
Integer

The entry number of the created message record.
